columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the coverage (CVG) record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SENT_INST
columns.description: The time an eligibility response was sent.

columns.name: RCVD_INST
columns.description: The time an eligibility response was received.

columns.name: RESP_ID
columns.description: The ID of the linked note (HNO) record for the response text.

columns.name: RESP_FILED_YN
columns.description: This item flags if the response data was filed.

columns.name: HGEN_INX
columns.description: Index to HGEN global for message info. Packed version of CVG 8550 HGEN INDEX

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: Record the patient ID of the member for the particular response message.

columns.name: QUERY_DATE
columns.description: A record of the service date queried.

columns.name: SENT_TRUE_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The time an eligibility response was sent, in instance format.

columns.name: RESPONSE_REG_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This contains the verification status associated with a specific RTE (real-time eligibility) Response.
